name: Mythocondro®
description: Mythocondro® is a fermentation-derived form of chondroitin sulfate, an ingredient linked with superior joint health. Chondroitin sulfate has become widely used as a dietary supplement to help keep joints healthy and treat osteoarthritis. Chondroitin sulfate has been traditionally sourced from animals, but concerns over cross-contamination, manufacturing processes, and contamination has driven demand for a non-animal source of this key nutrient. Gnosis by Lesaffre is proud to fulfill this demand with its revolutionary ingredient Mythocondro.
